name: Perpetual Burn
description: After the character to which this is attached uses a Skill: Each stack deals 1 Pyro DMG to that character. (Can stack, no stack limit).
descriptionraw: <color=#FFFFFFFF>After the character to which this is attached uses a Skill:</color> Each stack deals 1 $[K103] to that character. (Can stack, no stack limit).
descriptionreplaced: <color=#FFFFFFFF>After the character to which this is attached uses a Skill:</color> Each stack deals 1 {SPRITE_PRESET#2103}<color=#FF9999FF>Pyro DMG</color> to that character. (Can stack, no stack limit).
